      • getIconName

        public java.lang.String getIconName()
        Description copied from class: Tool
        Return the name of the SVG for the icon for the tool. This method will be called on initialization to load the icon for later representation.
        Specified by:
        getIconName in class Tool
        Returns:
        The fully qualified name of the SVG of the icon.

      • mouseButtonPressed

        public void mouseButtonPressed(Vector2D position,
                      int button)
        If the mouse pointer is above a shape, connection etc. and a mouse button is pressed, this function determines the correct reaction (updates properties bar) and indicates the corresponding form as selected.
        Overrides:
        mouseButtonPressed in class Tool
        Parameters:
        position - the mouse pointer position
        button - check, if left or right button pressed

      • mouseButtonReleased

        public void mouseButtonReleased(Vector2D position,
                       int button)
        Description copied from class: Tool
        Will be called by the application when a mouse button was released.
        Overrides:
        mouseButtonReleased in class Tool
        Parameters:
        position - The absolute position of the mouse cursor.
        button - The button that was released.

      • mouseMoved

        public void mouseMoved(Vector2D position)
        Checks (and set true) if the mouse pointer is above a shape, cutout edge etc and - if a button is additionally pressed - translates object positions corresponding to a basic drag and drop functionality
        Overrides:
        mouseMoved in class Tool
        Parameters:
        position - mouse pointer position
